page.title: 20THE LIFE OF AN 11 YEAR OLD
page.content:
When it is dinnertime I only have a snack and at teatime I have a proper dinner when I have a snack I have a sandwich and when I have dinner I have lots of vegetables and pies or meat. My favourite is hamburgers or salad. My favourite hot drink is black coffee and my fvourite cold drink is lager. When I go to Denton school I do lots of maths and lots of other things. I think school is very boring because you are always being told what to do. In our class we have 18 children our school is a very old school.
Daniel Cant Age 11
* Man Utd is Manchester United Football Team
